page.title: 04A school for the handicapped
page.content: The Ormrod school is for physically handicapped children from the area of 20 miles away.65 children attened this school but 50 go reguarly.The other 15 go to normal schools nearer to them. They have a variety of equipment including a swimming pool and a number of electric wheel chairs and special bikes and play cars.Some of the children can't write properly because of their handicap so they use a personal computer.They also have 7 classes with about 7 children in each class.They have 10 teachers a headmaster,7 helpers and special therapists.the building is 10 years old.The children go to school from 9.00-3.10 they get to their school by taxi.
